```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("espn2")
lid <- 453218

ff <-
  tibble(yr = 2014L:2017L) %>%
  mutate(data = purrr::map(yr, ~espn2::get_ff(leagueId = lid, year = .x))) %>% 
  unnest()
ff

```
